item.title: Go big or Go Home OR Go Hugo
item.description: This is the mandatory ‘Hello World’ post. Of course, it’s not 1997 any more, so ‘Hello World’ doesn’t cut it! The survey results are in: 5 out of 4 Trinity Takeis recommend blogging with Hugo%
